Interests

Apart from being a "tech nerd", I enjoy most of my time being outdoors with my wife and our dog. We enjoy hiking, playing basketball and walk around our neighborhood. I am an avid mountain biker!

When in indoors, I like to watch series/movies based on real life events, sports, militar and thiller genres. I enjoy "cooking" and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring/learning the latest technology advancements in the DevOps/Automation/Cloud world.
